name: Sprout Quest (Danthedude)
description:
NOTE: I am aware the Web Version is visually broken a bit (misaligned title and endscreen, missing visuals), errors that are not present in the PC build. The game works as normal.

This game was made for the MFGJ Winter Game Jam, and my first game ever.  You take control of a tomato, with a vine for a leg that can grow and shrink.

Controls:

A, D: Left and Right

W, S: Grow and Shrink

Space: Jump, resets size

Esc: Closes the game

Made in 14 days for the game jam.

Special thanks to the folks behind the MFGJ game jam.
